Instruction: Peel the carrots and cut them into diagonal slices.
In a skillet melt the butter over medium heat.
Add the carrots to the skillet and saute until they start to soften,  about 5 minutes.
Drizzle the honey over the carrots and toss to coat.
Season with salt and black pepper.
Continue to cook for another 5-7 minutes,  or until the carrots are tender and caramelized.
Serve hot as a side dish.
